API Documentation¶

class node.Node¶

Abstract base class for all nodes in the pipeline.

abstract process(data: Any, **kwargs) → Any¶

Processes the input data and returns the result. Args:

data: The input data to process. kwargs: (optional) additional data parameters

Returns:

The processed data.

class pipeline.Pipeline¶

A class representing a data processing pipeline.

class Channel(source: Optional[Node] = None, destination: Optional[Node] = None, dtype: Optional[Any] = None)¶

A class representing a communication channel between nodes.

edit_channel(new_source: Node, new_destination: Node)¶

Changes the direction of a channel. Args: new_source: new source node new_destination: new destination node

get_status()¶

Returns the status of the channel. Returns:

A dictionary containing information about the source node, destination node, and type of data being passed throught the channel

create_pipeline(nodes_data: List[Dict], custom_channels: List[tuple] = None)¶

Creates a pipeline with given nodes. Args:

nodes_data: A list of dictionaries, where each dict contains a 'node' key for node instance and optional 'params' and 'channels' keys. custom_channels: (optional) a list of tuples in format (source_node_index, destination_node_index). If not set, will be created a default chain of channels

edit_channel(source_node_type: str, destination_node_type: str)¶

Edits channel between two nodes, switching them Args:

source_node_type: type of source node destination_node_type: type of destination node

get_info() → Dict[str, Any]¶

Returns information about the pipeline. Returns:

A dictionary containing information about the nodes and channels in the pipeline.

run(input_data: Any)¶

Runs the pipeline. Args:

input_data: The initial data to pass to the first node of the pipeline.

Returns:

The output of the last node in the pipeline.

class node_pdf_parser.PDFParser¶

Concrete class for parsing PDF documents.

parse(path)¶

Parses metadata from the file and returns it as a dictionary. Also checks if the file type is PDF. Args:

path: Path to the metadata file.

Returns:

A dictionary with the metadata.

process(path, header_extractor=False)¶

Processes the document by parsing metadata and optionally extracts headers. Args:

path: Path to the metadata file. header_extractor: Boolean parameter defining whether headers extraction should be executed or not.

Returns:

The parsed data (new dictionary).

class node_data_operator.DataOperator¶

Concrete class for operating with data.

process(data, keys=None)¶

Processes the data with selectHeaderData() method Args:

data: Data to operate keys: keys to select

Returns:

selected data

Raises:

ValueError: if status not parsed

selectHeaderData(data, keys)¶

Selects data based on provided keys. Args:

data: Input data (dictionary). keys: A list of keys to select.

Returns:

A dictionary with selected key-value pairs.

Raises:

ValueError: If any of the keys are not found in the data.

class node_document_parser.DocumentParser¶

Abstract base class for document parser nodes.

abstract parse(path)¶

Abstract method to parse the document

Args:

path: Path to the document.

Returns:

The parsed data.

process(path)¶

Processes the path with parse() method Args:

path: path to the document

Returns:

The parsed data.
